name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Elite Trooper
text: Your non-unique characters have the Guardian keyword.
flavor: "Whatever you're planning, it won't work."
label: Captain Phasma - Elite Trooper

name: First Order Stormtrooper
flavor: Members of this new generation of stormtroopers are trained from birth and fed a steady diet of First Order propaganda to ensure absolute loyalty.
label: First Order Stormtrooper

name: General Grievous
subtitle: Jedi Hunter
text: Before an opponent's character is defeated, you may move one of their non-ability upgrades to this character.
label: General Grievous - Jedi Hunter

name: General Veers
subtitle: Field Commander
text: Action - Remove this die to turn one of your support dice to any side.
flavor: "General, prepare your troops for a surface attack." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: General Veers - Field Commander

name: AT-ST
text: [special] - Discard a support from play.
flavor: The All Terrain Scout Transport filled both support and reconnaissance roles in the Galactic Empire's war machine.
label: AT-ST

name: First Order TIE Fighter
text: [special] - Remove all shield from all of an opponent's characters.
label: First Order TIE Fighter

name: Commanding Presence
text:
Red character only.
[special] - Choose a Red die. If it is your die, resolve it, increasing its value by 2. If it is an opponent's die, remove it.
label: Commanding Presence

name: F-11D Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributing the damage as they wish.
label: F-11D Rifle

name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Devious Strategist
text: Before this character is dealt 1 or more damage, you may discard a card from your hand to give him 1 shield.
label: Count Dooku - Devious Strategist

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Sith Lord
text: After you activate this character you may force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.
flavor: "If you will not fight, then you will meet your destiny."
label: Darth Vader - Sith Lord

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Vader's Disciple
text: [special] - Choose an opponent's character. Then look at a random card in that opponent's hand and deal damage to that character equal to the cost of the card you just looked at.
label: Kylo Ren - Vader's Disciple

name: Nightsister
text: Action - Reroll a die. Deal 1 damage to this character.
flavor: Nightsisters are skilled at twisting the Force to serve their own ends.
label: Nightsister

name: Force Choke
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to another character. Then you may turn one of its character or upgrade dice to any side.
label: Force Choke

name: Immobilize
text: Blue Character only. Action - Remove this die to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Immobilize

name: Kylo Ren's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked by shields, reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Kylo Ren's Lightsaber

name: Sith Holocron
text: [special] - Switch this upgrade with a Blue ability upgrade in your hand, ignoring its play restrictions. Then you may spend 1 resource to roll its die into your pool, if able.
label: Sith Holocron

name: Infantry Grenades
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.
label: Infantry Grenades

name: Speeder Bike Scout
text: [special] - Remove a die. You may take one additional action.
label: Speeder Bike Scout

name: Bala-Tik
subtitle: Gang Leader
text: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may ready this character.
label: Bala-Tik - Gang Leader

name: Jabba the Hutt
subtitle: The Great and Mighty
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll a Yellow die.
flavor: "I shall enjoy watching you die."
label: Jabba the Hutt - The Great and Mighty

name: Jango Fett
subtitle: Lethal Mercenary
text: After an opponent activates a character, you may activate this character.
flavor: "There can be no mistakes this time."
label: Jango Fett - Lethal Mercenary

name: Tusken Raider
text: After you activate this character, you may discard a card from your hand to resolve one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: Tusken Raider

name: Crime Lord
text:
Yellow Character only.
[special] - Spend 5 resources to choose a character. That character is defeated after this round ends.
label: Crime Lord

name: Flame Thrower
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage each to up to 3 different characters.
label: Flame Thrower

name: Gaffi Stick
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Remove one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to deal 3 damage to a character.
label: Gaffi Stick

name: On The Hunt
text: [special] - Remove all shields from a character. You may spend 1 resource to remove one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: On The Hunt

name: Admiral Ackbar
subtitle: Perceptive Tactician
text: After an opponent plays or discards the last card from their hand, they choose and deal 2 damage to one of their characters.
label: Admiral Ackbar - Perceptive Tactician

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Born Leader
text: Action - Remove this die to reroll up to 2 of your dice.
flavor: "Someone has to save our skins."
label: Leia Organa - Born Leader

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: Ace Pilot
text: [special] - Discard a card from your hand to resolve one of the sides of its die, if able. Then, if it was a vehicle card, you may pay its cost to play it from your discard pile.
label: Poe Dameron - Ace Pilot

name: Rebel Trooper
text: Guardian.
label: Rebel Trooper

name: Launch Bay
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
label: Launch Bay

name: Black One
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
flavor: Poe Dameron's X-Wing was modified to be even more versatile than the standard T-70
label: Black One

name: Scout
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard the cheapest card from it (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: Scout

name: Survival Gear
flavor: To hide from the Empire, the rebels must often brave harsh environments.
label: Survival Gear

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Jedi Knight
text: After you activate this character, draw a card.
flavor: "I am a Jedi, like my father before me."
label: Luke Skywalker - Jedi Knight

name: Padawan
text: While this character does not have an upgrade, the cost to attach a weapon to it is decreased by 1.
label: Padawan

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Ataru Master
text: Before this character gains 1 or more shields, you may remove 1 of his shields to deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "Your focus determines your reality."
label: Qui-Gon Jinn - Ataru Master

name: Rey
subtitle: Force Prodigy
text: After you play an upgrade on this character, you may take one additional action.
flavor: "I think I can handle myself."
label: Rey - Force Prodigy

name: Force Protection
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
label: Force Protection

name: Jedi Robes
text: After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead in the first round of play.
label: Jedi Robes

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give a character 2 shields or deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber

name: One With The Force
text:
Blue character only.
Before attached character is defeated, this upgrade becomes a support for the rest of the game (it starts ready).
label: One With The Force

name: BB-8
text: [special] - Reroll this die and one of your other dice.  Do not remove this die from your pool after resolving this ability.
flavor: "Orange and white: one of a kind." <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
label: BB-8

name: Rey's Staff
text: [special] - Remove a die showing damage ([melee] or [ranged])
label: Rey's Staff

name: Finn
subtitle: First Order Defector
text: You can attach any weapon to this character, ignoring play restrictions. You can include Red Villain weapons and vehicles in your deck.
flavor: "I'm not going back."
label: Finn - First Order Defector

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Scoundrel
text: After you play a card with the Ambush keyword, you may give this character 1 shield.
flavor: "You know, sometimes I amaze even myself."
label: Han Solo - Scoundrel

name: Hired Gun
flavor: "You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: Hired Gun

name: Padme Amidala
subtitle: Queen of Naboo
text: [special] - Discard the top card of an opponent's deck or spend 1 resource to discard the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck.
flavor: "My fate will be no different to that of our people."
label: Padme Amidala - Queen of Naboo

name: Millennium Falcon
text: [special] - Play a Yellow event from your discard pile or hand for free.
flavor: "She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: Diplomatic Immunity
text: The shields from this die can be given to any of your characters distributed as you wish.
label: Diplomatic Immunity

name: DL-44 Heavy Blaster Pistol
text:
Ambush.
After you play this upgrade, force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice.
label: DL-44 Heavy Blaster Pistol

name: Infiltrate
text: [special] - Reroll up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
label: Infiltrate

name: Outpost
text: [special] - Resolve the battlefield ability as if you had just claimed it.
label: Outpost

name: DH-17 Blaster Pistol
flavor: The weapon of choice for rebel soldiers and imperial officers alike during the Galactic Civil War.
label: DH-17 Blaster Pistol

name: IQA-11 Blaster Rifle
text: [special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: IQA-11 Blaster Rifle

name: Promotion
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.
label: Promotion

name: Force Throw
text:
Blue Character Only.
[special] - Remove a die to deal a character damage equal to the value showing on that die (specials and blanks are zeroes).
label: Force Throw

name: Force Training
text:
To play, spot a Blue character.
[special] - Choose and do two of the following: deal 1 damage to a character, or gain 1 resource, or give a character 1 shield.
label: Force Training

name: Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber

name: Mind Probe
text:
Blue Character only.
[special] - Deal an opponent's character 1 damage for each card in that opponent's hand.
label: Mind Probe

name: Comlink
text: After you play this upgrade, you may reroll any number of your dice or any number of an opponent's dice.
label: Comlink

name: Datapad
text: [special] - Turn one of your dice to a side not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Datapad

name: Holdout Blaster
text: Ambush. Redeploy.
label: Holdout Blaster

name: Black Market
text: [special] - Draw 2 cards. You may play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Black Market

name: Cunning
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Resolve a special ability ([special]) on another card in play as if it were your card.
label: Cunning

text: [special] - Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]) and give attached character 1 shield.
label: Jetpack

text:
To play, spot a Yellow character.
[special] - Deal 3 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.

text: Deal one of your non-unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]). Then remove that die.

text: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck instead of discarding it.
label: Closing the Net

text: Return one of your defeated non-unique Red characters to the game with no damage on it.
flavor: Battle droids are less effective than flesh and blood soldiers, but they are also much cheaper to replace.
label: Endless Ranks

name: Occupation
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Force an opponent to lose all of their resources.
label: Occupation

name: Probe
text: Look at two random cards from your opponent's hand and discard any of these cards that are events.
label: Probe

name: Sweep the Area
text: Count the number of ready Red characters you have. Reroll that many of an opponent's dice.
label: Sweep the Area

name: Tactical Mastery
text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.
label: Tactical Mastery

name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
flavor: "There they are! Blast them!"
label: The Best Defense...

text: Action - Exhaust this support and one of your characters to gain 1 resource.
label: Drudge Work

name: Local Garrison
text: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during each upkeep phase to a minimum of 1.
label: Local Garrison

name: Personal Escort
text: Attached character has the Guardian keyword.
label: Personal Escort

name: Abandon All Hope
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose all of their resources or discard all cards in their hand.
label: Abandon All Hope

name: Boundless Ambition
text: Draw cards up to your hand size.
label: Boundless Ambition

name: Enrage
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters to gain 1 resource.
label: Enrage

name: Feel Your Anger
text: Count the number of blanks ([blank]) showing on an opponent's dice. Remove that many of their dice.
flavor: "Let the hate flow through you." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Feel Your Anger

name: Force Strike
text: Turn one of your Blue dice to the side showing melee damage ([melee]). Then you may resolve that die.
label: Force Strike

name: Intimidate
text: Remove all shields from a character.
label: Intimidate

name: Isolation
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.
label: Isolation

text: Discard any number of Blue cards from your hand. Then resolve one of your dice showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]), increasing its value by 1 for each card you just discarded.
label: No Mercy

name: Pulling the Strings
text: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck. Then place those cards on the top and/or bottom of that deck in any order.
label: Pulling the Strings

name: Emperor's Favor
text: Your hand size is increased by 1.
label: Emperor's Favor

name: Power of the Dark Side
text: Action - Exaust this support to reroll one of your dice. If that die rolls a blank ([blank]), deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
flavor: "If you only knew the power of the dark side." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Power of the Dark Side

name: Hidden In Shadow
text: Action - If attached character has no shields, exhaust this upgrade to give it 1 shield.
label: Hidden In Shadow

name: Nowhere to Run
text: Turn each of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to any side.
label: Nowhere to Run

text: Discard a Yellow upgrade from your hand to roll its die into your pool, if able. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.

text: Discard any number of upgrades from one of your Yellow characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of upgrades you just discarded.

text: Spend resources equal to the cost of an opponent's upgrade in play to return that upgrade to their hand.
label: Confiscation

text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Fight Dirty

text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), treating this damage as unblockable.

text: Remove one of your dice to remove an opponent's die.
flavor: "I don't like you, either."

text: Force an opponent to choose and discard cards from their hand down to the number of cards you have in your hand.
label: Lying in Wait

text: After you resolve a die showing disrupt ([disrupt]), you may exhaust this support to gain resources equal to the number of resources your opponent just lost.

text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.
label: Underworld Connections

text: After you play this upgrade, you may remove an opponent's character die and place it here. It is not rolled by any character and does not return to its character unless this upgrade leaves play.

text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing discard ([discard]), increasing its value by 2. Then draw a card.
label: Commando Raid

name: Defensive Position
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 2 or higher.
label: Defensive Position

text: Remove 2 damage from a character.

name: Hit and Run
text:
Ambush.
Activate one of your Red characters.
label: Hit and Run

text: Choose a symbol showing on an opponent's die. Then turn up to 2 of your Red dice to sides showing that symbol.
label: It's a Trap!

name: Natural Talent
text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Natural Talent

name: Rearm
text: Play a Red upgrade from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Rearm

name: Retreat
text: Your opponent may take 1 action. Then end the action phase.
label: Retreat

text: Ready or exhaust a support.

text: Action - Exhaust this support and discard a card from your hand to give a character 1 shield. Then ready this support unless an opponent spends 1 resource.
label: Resistance HQ

text: Force an opponent to choose and resolve any number of their dice in the order of their choice. Then remove all of their dice they did not resolve.
label: Anticipate

text: Give a character 2 shields.
label: Defensive Stance

text: Choose a symbol showing on one of your Blue dice. Then remove all of an opponent's dice showing that symbol.
label: Force Misdirection

text: Deal one of your unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Then remove that die.
label: Heroism

text: Defeat one of your Blue characters to exhaust a character.
label: Noble Sacrifice

name: Patience
text: Remove any number of your dice. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Patience

text: Add a blue event from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: "Pass on what you have learned." <cite>Yoda</cite>

text: Remove any number of shields from one of your characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of shields you just removed.

text: Move 1 damage from one of your exhausted characters to an opponent's exhausted character (this ignores shields).

text: Action - Exhaust this support to look at the top 2 cards of a player's deck. Then you may discard one of those cards and have that player draw the other.
label: Jedi Council

name: Awakening
text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a modified side (a side with a +) as if it was not modified (did not have the +).
label: Awakening

text: Action - Exhaust this support and discard a Blue card from your hand to play another copy of that card from your hand for free.
label: The Force is Strong

name: Daring Escape
text:
Ambush.
Reroll any number of an opponent's dice. Then remove all of ther dice showing blanks ([blank]).
label: Daring Escape

text: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavor: "I got one! I got one!" <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>

text: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).

text: End the action phase. You may switch the battlefield with the battlefield that is not being used. Set aside this card instead of discarding it.

text: Force an opponent to choose to either deal one of their exausted characters 2 damage or choose and remove 2 of their dice.

text:
Ambush.

text: Spot a Yellow character and discard a card from your hand to gain 1 resource.
label: Smuggling

text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your Yellow dice. If it rolls a resource ([resource]), gain 1 resource.

text: Ambush. Action - Exhaust this support to look at an opponent's hand.

text:
Yellow character only.
Before attached character would be defeated, instead heal 5 damage from it and discard this upgrade from play.
label: Second Chance

text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you are resolving a vehicle die.

label: Leadership

text: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol ([resource]), increasing its value by 1.

text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increasing its value by 1.

flavor: "I fear something terrible has happened, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out and were silenced." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>

Ambush.
