name: Tie Pilot
text: While this die is in your pool, your other dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) cannot be removed by an opponent.
flavor: "I can't shake him!" <cite>Biggs Darklighter</cite>
label: Tie Pilot

name: E-Web Emplacement
text: While you control the battlefield, the value of each of this die's sides is increased by 1.
label: E-Web Emplacement

name: Imperial Discipline
text: Red character only. Action - Remove this die to turn one of this character's character or upgrade dice to a side showing ranged damage ([ranged]) or a resource ([resource]).
label: Imperial Discipline

name: DT-29 Heavy Blaster Pistol
text: [special] - Remove an opponent's die showing a resource cost.
label: DT-29 Heavy Blaster Pistol

name: Z6 Riot Control Baton
text:
Redeploy.
After you roll this die into your pool, you may reroll it.
label: Z6 Riot Control Baton

name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Force Assassin
text: After an opponent discards a card from their hand to reroll dice, you may force them to choose and discard another card from their hand.
flavor: "Your weakness will not be my downfall!"
label: Asajj Ventress - Force Assassin

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Dark Apprentice
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to a character. Then deal 1 damage to this character.
flavor: "You understimate my power."
label: Darth Vader - Dark Apprentice

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Galactic Emperor
text: After you resolve this die, force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributed as they wish.
flavor: "Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen."
label: Palpatine - Galactic Emperor

name: Royal Guard
text: Guardian. You cannot play Blue abilities on this character.
label: Royal Guard

name: Command Shuttle
text: [special] - Use a special ability ([special]) on one of your characters.
label: Command Shuttle

name: Force Lightning
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. You  may remove a die showing a blank ([blank]) to reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Force Lightning

name: Lightsaber Pike
text: Action - Remove this die to give a non-attached character 1 shield.
label: Lightsaber Pike

name: Lure of Power
text: You may resolve the modifier sides (sides with a +) of this die to modify any symbol.
label: Lure of Power

name: Interrogation Droid
text: After you activate this support, look at a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card is an event, you may remove this die to discard it.
label: Interrogation Droid

name: Aurra Sing
subtitle: Deadly Shot
text: Before you resolve this die, you may discard a card from your hand you increase its value by 1.
flavor: "Well, what do we have here?"
label: Aurra Sing - Deadly Shot

name: Guavian Enforcer
text: Action - Remove this die to remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Guavian Enforcer

name: IG-88
subtitle: Assassin Droid
text: [special] - Play a Yellow weapon or equipment from your discard pile on this character, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: IG-88 - Assassin Droid

name: Unkar Plutt
subtitle: Junk Dealer
text: Action - Remove any number of your dice showing a combined value of 3 or more. Then discard a random card from an opponent's hand and gain resources equal to its cost.
label: Unkar Plutt - Junk Dealer

name: Slave I
text: [special] - Force an opponent to deal damage to their characters equal to the number of dice in their dice pool, distributed as they wish.
label: Slave I

name: Blackmail
text: After you roll this die, any opponent may give you 1 resource to remove this die.
label: Blackmail

name: Personal Shield
text: Before attached character is dealt 2 or more ranged damage ([ranged]), you may exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
label: Personal Shield

name: Vibroknucklers
text:
Ambush.
Before resolving this die, you  may spend 1 resource to increase its value by 1.
label: Vibroknucklers

name: Baze Malbus
subtitle: Crack Shot
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Baze Malbus - Crack Shot

name: Mon Mothma
subtitle: Skilled Politician
text: After you play an event, you may reroll a die of the same color as that event.
label: Mon Mothma - Skilled Politician

name: Rebel Commando
text: [special] - Remove an opponent's die.
label: Rebel Commando

name: Temmin "Snap" Wexley
subtitle: Recon Specialist
text: While at least one of this die is in your pool, your opponent must spend 1 resource in order to claim the battlefield.
flavor: "Watch out for ground fire!"
label: Temmin "Snap" Wexley - Recon Specialist

name: C-3PO
text: Action - Remove this die to resolve one of your dice as if it were showing a different symbol (it keeps its original value).
flavor: "It is I, See-Threepio!"
label: C-3PO

name: U-Wing
text:
[special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
[special] - Give each of your characters 2 shields.
label: U-Wing

name: A180 Blaster
text:
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character and give attached character 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: A180 Blaster

name: Overkill
flavor: The most hardened soldiers already know they're dead.
label: Overkill

name: Jedi Acolyte
text: Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1, if it is showing the same symbol as one of your other dice.
label: Jedi Acolyte

name: Chirrut Îmwe
subtitle: Blind Warrior
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, you may reroll all of your dice showing blanks ([blank]).
label: Chirrut Îmwe - Blind Warrior

name: Luminara Unduli
subtitle: Inspiring Commander
text: [special] - Resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 2, or by 3 instead if it is a non-unique character die.
flavor: "Synchronize on my mark."
label: Luminara Unduli - Inspiring Commander

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Mysterious Hermit
text:
Guardian.
Before this character is defeated, you may play a Blue card from your hand or discard pile for free.
flavor: "Stretch out with your feelings."
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Mysterious Hermit

name: Delta-7 Interceptor
text: [special] - Reroll up to 3 dices (yours and/or your opponent's).
flavor: A favorite of the Jedi during the Clone Wars.
label: Delta-7 Interceptor

name: Handcrafted Light Bow
text:
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character.
[special] - Remove all shields from a character. Then deal 2 damage to that character.
label: Handcrafted Light Bow

name: Force Heal
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character or spend 1 resource to heal 2 damage from a character.
label: Force Heal

name: Journals of Ben Kenobi
text: Action - Remove this die to draw a card.
label: Journals of Ben Kenobi

name: R2-D2
text: [special] - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "That little droid and I have been through a lot together." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: R2-D2

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: Loyal Friend
text: [special] - Turn a opponent's die to a side showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) to deal that damage to a character.
flavor: Rroooaarrgghh!
label: Chewbacca - Loyal Friend

name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Reckless Operative
text: The cost of the first Yellow event you play each round is decreased by 1.
label: Jyn Erso - Reckless Operative

name: Maz Kanata
subtitle: Pirate Queen
text: After you activate this character, you may resolve up to 2 of your dice.
flavor: If you live long enough, you see the same eyes in different people.
label: Maz Kanata - Pirate Queen

name: Outer Rim Smuggler
text: The first time each round you play the last card from your hand, gain 1 resource.
label: Outer Rim Smuggler

name: Smuggling Freighter
text: After you resolve one of this die's sides showing a value of 2, place this support on the top of your deck.
label: Smuggling Freighter

name: Bowcaster
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage each to up to 2 different characters.
flavor: "I like this thing." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Bowcaster

name: Lone Operative
text: [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character, or 3 damage instead if attached characer is your only character in play.
label: Lone Operative

name: Maz's Goggles
text:
To play, spot a Yellow character.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it.
label: Maz's Goggles

name: Supply Line
text: [special] - Reroll any number of your dice.
label: Supply Line

name: Astromech
text: Action - Remove this die to turn a vehicle die to any side.
label: Astromech

name: Rocket Launcher
text: [special] - Discard a vehicle from play. [special] - Deal 2 damage each to up to 2 different characters.
label: Rocket Launcher

name: Force Push
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn up to 2 of an opponent's dice to sides of your choice.
label: Force Push

name: Force Speed
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Take up to 2 additional actions.
label: Force Speed

name: Makashi Training
text: To play, spot a Blue character. Action - Remove one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) and exhaust this upgrade to remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Makashi Training

name: Vibroknife
text:
Ambush.
Damage dealt by this die or by dice it modifies is unblockable.
label: Vibroknife

name: Quadjumper
text: Action - Discard this support to play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 3.
label: Quadjumper

name: Ascension Gun
text: [special] - Use the ability on a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) as if you had just claimed it.
label: Ascension Gun

name: Con Artist
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Place 1 damage on this upgrade. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the amount of damage on this upgrade.
label: Con Artist

name: Battle Formation
text:
Ambush.
Count the number of Red characters you have. You may reroll that many of your dice.
label: Battle Formation

name: Imperial War Machine
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a resource cost for free.
label: Imperial War Machine

name: Lockdown
text: Ambush. Spot two Red characters to take control of the battlefield. (This does not claim the battlefield.)
label: Lockdown

name: Sustained Fire
text:
Play only if you have 2 or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove all shields from all of an opponent's characters.
label: Sustained Fire

name: Traitor!
text:
Ambush.
Discard the top card of your deck. Then remove a die not showing a special ([special]) that has a value equal to or less than the cost of the card you just discarded.
label: Traitor!

name: Trench Warfare
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a shield ([shield]).
Turn any number of an opponent's dice to sides showing shields ([shield]).
label: Trench Warfare

name: Undying Loyalty
text: Heal 1 damage from a Red character. If there is another copy of this event in your discard pile, you may spend 1 resource to place this event on the top of your deck instead of discarding it.
label: Undying Loyalty

name: We Have Them Now
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Turn up to 4 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: We Have Them Now

name: Attrition
text: After one of your characters is defeated, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Attrition

name: Imperial Inspection
text: After one of your dice rolls a disrupt ([disrupt]), you may set this support aside to return an upgrade in play that costs 2 or less to its owner's hand.
label: Imperial Inspection

name: Anger
text:
Play only if you have 2 or more dice showing blanks ([blank]).
Resolve an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) as if it were your die.
label: Anger

name: Lightsaber Throw
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing melee damage ([melee]).
Deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber Throw

name: Manipulate
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Then turn an opponent's die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Manipulate

name: No Disintegrations
text: Discard the top card of an opponent's deck, or 3 cards instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: No Disintegrations

name: Now You Will Die
text: Resolve one of your dice as if it were showing melee damage ([melee]) (it keeps its original value).
label: Now You Will Die

name: Rise Again
text: Heal 5 damage from a unique Blue character. You may play an upgrade from your discard pile on it for free.
label: Rise Again

name: The Price of Failure
text: Spot a Blue character and defeat one of your characters to ready a character.
label: The Price of Failure

name: Dark Presence
text: After one of your dice rolls a discard ([discard]), you may exhaust this support to force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice.
label: Dark Presence

name: Now I Am The Master
text: After attached character's character or upgrade dice deal damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Now I Am The Master

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.
label: Doubt

name: Arms Deal
text: Discard any number of weapons from your hand. Then gain 1 resource for each card you just discarded.
label: Arms Deal

name: Bait and Switch
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to any side.
label: Bait and Switch

name: Friends in High Places
text:
Play only if you have dice showing a combined value of 7 or more.
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play one of those cards for free. Discard the cards you don't play.
label: Friends in High Places

name: Loose Ends
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to discard the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck.
label: Loose Ends

name: One-Quarter Portion
text: Remove an opponenet's die. Then that opponent gains 1 resource.
label: One-Quarter Portion

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Move up to 2 damage from an opponent's character to another character (this ignores shields.)
label: Relentless Pursuit

name: Scrap Buy
text: Play only if you have 3 or more cards in your discard pile. Add a random card from your discard pile to your hand (show the card to your opponents).
label: Scrap Buy

name: Salvage Stand
text: After one of your dice rolls a resource ([resource]), you may exhaust this support to force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Salvage Stand

name: Armor Plating
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may block up to 2 damage. Then discard this upgrade from play.
label: Armor Plating

name: Emergency Evacuation
text: Remove all dice.
label: Emergency Evacuation

name: Friendly Fire
text: Spot a Red character and remove an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to deal that damage to a character.
label: Friendly Fire

name: Guerrilla Warfare
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your Red dice to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Guerrilla Warfare

name: Our Only Hope
text: Draw a card. You may play that card for free or discard that card to gain 2 resources.
label: Our Only Hope

name: Rebel Assault
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Rebel Assault

name: Sensor Placement
text: Spot a red character to resolve an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) as if it were your die.
label: Sensor Placement

name: Spirit of Rebellion
text: Give a character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Spirit of Rebellion

name: Planetary Uprising
text: After you claim the battlefield, force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributed as they wish.
label: Planetary Uprising

name: Spy Net
text: After one of your dice rolls a focus ([focus]), you may exhaust this support to discard the top card of an opponent's deck.
label: Spy Net

name: Tactical Aptitude
text: After you activate attached character, you may draw a card. Then place a card form your hand on the bottom of your deck.
label: Tactical Aptitude

name: Caution
text: Remove one of your character dice to give another character 3 shields.
label: Caution

name: Destiny
text: Remove any number of your Blue dice. Play a card from your hand for free that costs equal to or less than the combined value of the Blue dice you just removed.
label: Destiny

name: Determination
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a focus ([focus]). Resolve one of your dice as if it was showing a different symbol (it keeps its original value)
label: Determination

name: Guard
text: Remove one of your Blue dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to remove a number of an opponent's dice equal to the value of the die you just removed.
label: Guard

name: Krayt Dragon Howl
text: Spot a Blue character to choose an opponent's die. That opponent chooses to either remove that die or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Krayt Dragon Howl

name: My Ally Is The Force
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your Blue dice without removing it from your pool.
label: My Ally Is The Force

name: Synchronicity
text:
Play only if you have dice showing melee damage ([melee]) and shields ([shield]).
Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Synchronicity

name: Your Eyes Can Deceive You
text: After one of your dice rolls a shield ([shield]), you may exhaust this support to turn an opponent's die to any side.
label: Your Eyes Can Deceive You

name: Protective Mentor
text: Attached character's shields can be used to block damage dealt to any character.
label: Protective Mentor

name: Confidence
text: Choose an opponent's die and force them to resolve it, if able.
label: Confidence

name: Garbage'll Do
text: Ambush. Remove one of your vehicle dice to give each of your characters 1 shield.
label: Garbage'll Do

name: Hold On!
text:
Ambush.
Move any number of shields from one of your character to another character.
label: Hold On!

name: Rebel
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a discard.
Play a card from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Rebel

name: Long Con
text: Gain 3 resources if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Long Con

name: Loth-Cat and Mouse
text: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of your dice. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Loth-Cat and Mouse

name: Never Tell Me The Odds
text: Choose one of your Yellow characters. Turn any number of its character and upgrade dice to sides of your choice.
label: Never Tell Me The Odds

name: Planned Explosion
text:
Play only if you have dice showing a combined value of 10 or more.
Remove all of your dice and deal 10 damage to a character.
label: Planned Explosion

name: Double-Dealing
text: After one of your dice rolls a special ([special]), you may exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.
label: Double-Dealing

name: Life Debt
text: Yellow character only. After you activate this character, you may move 1 damage from another character to this character (this ignores shields).
label: Life Debt

name: Bombing Run
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]). Then deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Bombing Run

name: Collateral Damage
text: Resolve one or more of your dice showing either melee damage ([melee]) or ranged damage ([ranged]). Then force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Collateral Damage

name: Salvo
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) against each of an opponent's characters.
label: Salvo

name: Suppression
text: Remove one of your Red dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Then remove an opponent's die.
label: Suppression

name: Aftermath
text: After a character is defeated, gain 1 resource.
label: Aftermath

name: Air Superiority
text: After you play this support, place 3 shields on it. Action - Exhaust this support to move 1 shield from it to a character.
label: Air Superiority

name: Training
text: Non-unique Red character only. Attached character is elite (place a second copy of its die on its card).
label: Training

name: Wingman
text:
Red character only.
After you activate a Red character, you may activate attached character.
label: Wingman

name: Decisive Blow
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]). Then remove all character and upgrade dice of the character you just dealt damage to.
label: Decisive Blow

name: High Ground
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Then, if it was a character die, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: High Ground

name: Momentum Shift
text: Move 1 shield from an opponent's character to one of your characters.
label: Momentum Shift

name: Overconfidence
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll 2 dice. Then remove one of those dice with the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: Overconfidence

name: Premonitions
text: Choose one: set this card aside and stack a card from your hand on it facedown, or play the card stacked on another copy of this card for free and discard the set aside copy.
label: Premonitions

name: Rejuvenate
text: Spot a Blue character to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Rejuvenate

name: Trust Your Instincts
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice. Then you may draw a card.
label: Trust Your Instincts

name: Meditate
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to turn one of your dice to a side not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Meditate

name: Force Illusion
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard cards from the top of your deck equal to that damage to block it. Then discard this upgrade from play.
label: Force Illusion

name: Evade
text: Remove a die showing ranged damage [ranged]
label: Evade

name: New Orders
text: Switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) and use its claim ability.
label: New Orders

name: Parry
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Parry

name: Swiftness
text: Ambush. (You may take one additional action after you play this card.) Give the next card you play this turn the Ambush keyword.
label: Swiftness

name: Resolve
text: Action - Discard a card from your hand to reroll an opponent's die.
label: Resolve

name: Ammo Belt
text: Before a weapon upgrade on attached character would be discarded by a card effect, you may discard this upgrade instead.
label: Ammo Belt

name: Bolt Hole
text: Remove one of your Yellow character dice to give that character 2 shields.
label: Bolt Hole

name: Cheat
text: Switch a card in your hand with a card in your discard pile.
label: Cheat

name: Diversion
text: Force an opponent to lose 1 resource, or 3 resources instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Diversion

name: "Fair" Trade
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]). Then switch all of your resources with all of an opponent's resources.
label: "Fair" Trade

name: Friends in Low Places
text: Spot a Yellow character to look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it that costs 1 or less.
label: Friends in Low Places

name: Sabotage
text: Discard cards from your hand equal to the cost of a support in play to discard that support.
label: Sabotage

name: Improvisation
text: Ambush. Action - Remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to reroll any number of your dice.
label: Improvisation

name: Outmaneuver
text: After you claim the battlefield, gain 1 resource.
label: Outmaneuver

name: Fast Hands
text:
Yellow character only.
After you activate attached character, you may resolve one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: Fast Hands

name: Carbon-freezing Chamber
subtitle: Bespin
text: Claim - Choose a character die. That die cannot be rolled during the next round.
label: Carbon-freezing Chamber - Bespin

name: Cargo Hold
subtitle: Eravana
text: Claim - Move an upgrade from a character to another character controlled by the same player.
label: Cargo Hold - Eravana

name: Docking Bay
subtitle: Finalizer
text: Claim - Play a support from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Docking Bay - Finalizer

name: Ewok Village
subtitle: Endor
text: Claim - Remove all shields from a character.
label: Ewok Village - Endor

name: Maz's Castle
subtitle: Takodana
text: Claim - Draw 2 cards. Place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck (in any order).
label: Maz's Castle - Takodana

name: Moisture Farm
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource.
label: Moisture Farm - Tatooine

name: Otoh Gunga
subtitle: Naboo
text: Claim - Heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Otoh Gunga - Naboo

name: Secluded Beach
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Remove an opponent's die showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Secluded Beach - Scarif

name: Secret Facility
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve up to 3 of your dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Secret Facility - Scarif

name: War-Torn Streets
subtitle: Jedha
text: Claim - Discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: War-Torn Streets - Jedha

name: Ciena Ree
subtitle: Adept Pilot
text: Action - Spend 2 resources to ready a vehicle.
flavor: A veteran of the battles over Endor and Jakku, Captain Ree was an accomplished pilot and commander.
label: Ciena Ree - Adept Pilot

name: General Hux
subtitle: Aspiring Commander
text: [special] - Play a Red event from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 for each character you have.
flavor: "All remaining systems will bow to the First Order!"
label: General Hux - Aspiring Commander

name: MagnaGuard
text: Before this character would be defeated by damage, instead defeat it after this round ends.
flavor: The IG-100 MagnaGuard droid could withstand massive damage before total system failure.
label: MagnaGuard

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Master Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a number. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it that costs the chosen number.
flavor: "I study the art of war."
label: Thrawn - Master Strategist

name: AT-DP
text: [special] - Discard a support that costs 2 or less from play.
flavor: The All Terrain Defense Pod was a heavily armed walker used to protect Imperial assets on occupied worlds.
label: AT-DP

name: Probe Droid
text:
Ambush.
[special] - Look at 2 random cards in an opponent's hand and discard any of those cards that are events.
flavor: "We have thousands of probe droids searching the galaxy." <cite>Admiral Ozzel</cite>
label: Probe Droid

name: T-7 Ion Disruptor Rifle
text: To play, spot a Red character. Action - Discard a card from your hand to turn this die to the side that has a value 1 higher than the value showing on this die.
label: T-7 Ion Disruptor Rifle

name: Quinlan Vos
subtitle: Dark Disciple
text: [special] - Deal damage to an opponent's character equal to the number of cards in your hand more than the number of cards in that opponent's hand.
flavor: "Are you finished messing around?"
label: Quinlan Vos - Dark Disciple

name: Servant of the Dark Side
text: Before one of your other Blue characters is defeated, you may move an upgrade from it to this character (return that upgrade's die to its card).
label: Servant of the Dark Side

name: Seventh Sister
subtitle: Agile Inquisitor
text: After you activate this character, you may roll an ID9 Seeker Droid ([EaW]13) die into your pool (its X value is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool). Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Seventh Sister - Agile Inquisitor

name: Grand Inquisitor
subtitle: Sith Loyalist
text: [special] - Remove a character die showing a blank ([blank]). Then deal 2 damage to that character.
flavor: "At last, a fight that might be worthy of my time."
label: Grand Inquisitor - Sith Loyalist

name: Darth Vader's TIE Advanced
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to deal damage to a character equal to the damage on it.
flavor: The TIE/x1 was an advanced prototype flown by Darth Vader at the Battle of Yavin
label: Darth Vader's TIE Advanced

name: ID9 Seeker Droid
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool (when resolving dice, resolve them one at a time).
label: ID9 Seeker Droid

name: Temptation
text: [special] - Choose an opponent. That opponent may draw 2 cards. If they do, you gain 2 resources. If they do not, you draw 2 cards.
flavor: "You want this, don't you?" <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Temptation

name: Grand Inquisitor's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a character die to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Grand Inquisitor's Lightsaber

name: Bazine Netal
subtitle: Master Manipulator
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has no damage on it.
flavor: "Inform the First Order… I've found the droid."
label: Bazine Netal - Master Manipulator

name: Bossk
subtitle: Wookiee Slayer
text: After you activate this character, you may move 1 damage from an opponent's character to another character (this ignores shields).
label: Bossk - Wookiee Slayer

name: Cad Bane
subtitle: Vicious Mercenary
text: Action - Play an upgrade from your hand on this character (paying its cost). Then you may activate him.
flavor: "I'll take on any job… for the right price."
label: Cad Bane - Vicious Mercenary

name: Gamorrean Guard
text: Guardian.
label: Gamorrean Guard

name: Hound's Tooth
text: After you activate this support, you may remove one of your Yellow character dice to gain 1 resource.
flavor: Bossk's ship was a YV-666 light freighter modified to serve the bounty hunter's needs.
label: Hound's Tooth

name: Cable Launcher
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Choose a character. Remove one of its character dice or spend 1 resource to remove 2 of its character dice.
label: Cable Launcher

name: LL-30 Blaster Pistol
text:
Ambush.
Redeploy.
[special] - Turn another one of your dice to a side showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: LL-30 Blaster Pistol

name: Relby-V10 Mortar Gun
text: Action - Spend 2 resources and remove this die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to deal that damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Relby-V10 Mortar Gun

name: General Rieekan
subtitle: Defensive Mastermind
text: After you activate this character, you may discard a card from the top of an opponent's deck for each of your other characters with 1 or more shields.
label: General Rieekan - Defensive Mastermind

name: Hera Syndulla
subtitle: Phoenix Leader
text: [special] - Play a vehicle from your hand for free. After the action phase ends, if that vehicle is still in play, return it to your hand.
flavor: "If all you do is fight for your own life, then your life is worth nothing!"
label: Hera Syndulla - Phoenix Leader

name: K-2SO
subtitle: Reprogrammed Droid
text: The cost to play a weapon on this character is increased by 2. After you play or move a weapon onto this character for the first time each game, ready him.
flavor: "Why does she get a blaster and I don't?"
label: K-2SO - Reprogrammed Droid

name: Rookie Pilot
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll one of your vehicle dice.
flavor: The first time in the cockpit was always thrilling… even if it was the last.
label: Rookie Pilot

name: Ghost
text: [special] - Resolve another side of this die.
flavor: The Ghost was a specialized VCX-100 light freighter that served as the base of operations for Hera Syndulla's rebel cell.
label: Ghost

name: Y-Wing
text: [special] - Force an opponent to deal damage to their characters, distributed as they wish, or lose resource, until they have dealt and lost a combined total of 4.
label: Y-Wing

name: A280 Blaster Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Give 2 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
label: A280 Blaster Rifle

name: Ahsoka Tano
subtitle: Force Operative
text: After you activate this character for the first time each round, you may spend resources equal to the number of dice you just rolled to ready her.
flavor: "I am no Jedi."
label: Ahsoka Tano - Force Operative

name: Jedi Instructor
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of your character dice to a side showing the same symbol as this die.
flavor: That Jedi passed down their wisdom and craft from Master to Padawan.
label: Jedi Instructor

name: Kanan Jarrus
subtitle: Rebel Jedi
text: Before you take an action, you may resolve one of this die.
flavor: "There's a lot more at stake than you realize."
label: Kanan Jarrus - Rebel Jedi

name: Mace Windu
subtitle: Jedi Champion
text: Action - Remove this die to defeat a character with 2 or less remaining health.
flavor: "This party's over."
label: Mace Windu - Jedi Champion

name: Training Remote
text: You may resolve the modifier sides on this die to modify any symbol on one of your Blue character dice.
flavor: "Look, good against remotes is one thing. Good against the living? That's something else." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Training Remote

name: Master of the Council
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 2 resources to ready a character.
flavor: "The council has assembled." <cite>Mace Windu</cite>
label: Master of the Council

name: Coordination
text: [special] - Give each of your characters 1 shield.
label: Coordination

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Force-sensitive Thief
text:
You may play Blue upgrades on this character, ignoring play restrictions.
[special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent.
flavor: "Hey, a kid's gotta eat."
label: Ezra Bridger - Force-sensitive Thief

name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Galactic Entrepreneur
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.
flavor: "Yeah. I'm responsible these days. It's the price you pay for being successful."
label: Lando Calrissian - Galactic Entrepreneur

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Explosives Expert
text: Before you activate this character, you may play a weapon from your discard pile on her, decreasing its cost by 1 if it has the word "Thermal" in its title.
flavor: "I'll damage you if you don't shut up."
label: Sabine Wren - Explosives Expert

name: Wookiee Warrior
flavor: "It's not wise to upset a wookiee." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Wookiee Warrior

name: Chopper
text: [special] - Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
flavor: C1-10P was a temperamental astromech better known to the members of its rebel cell as "Chopper".
label: Chopper

name: Energy Slingshot
text: After you resolve this die, you may spend 1 resource to reroll it instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Energy Slingshot

name: Tough Haggler
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and choose 2 cards in it. Then discard those cards unless that opponent spends 2 resources.
label: Tough Haggler

name: T-47 Airspeeder
text: [special] - Exhaust a support or draw 2 cards.
flavor: The Incom Corporation T-47 airspeeder was a rugged low-altitude vehicle prized by the Alliance for its durability.
label: T-47 Airspeeder

name: LR1K Sonic Cannon
text: Before resolving this die, you may exhaust one of your characters. If you do, you do not have to pay the resource cost on this die.
flavor: Developed by the Geonosians, the LR1K generated deadly sonic blasts.
label: LR1K Sonic Cannon

name: Electrostaff
text: The resource cost of attached character's character dice modified by this die is decreased by 1.
label: Electrostaff

name: Natural Pilot
text: After you activate attached character, you may ready a vehicle.
label: Natural Pilot

name: Ancient Lightsaber
text: Action - Heal 2 damage from attached character. Place this upgrade on the bottom of your deck.
label: Ancient Lightsaber

name: Psychometry
text: Blue character only. [special] - Draw cards equal to the value showing on an equipment or weapon die. You may remove that die.
label: Psychometry

name: Shoto Lightsaber
text: After you activate attached character, if it has another Blue weapon, you may give it 1 shield or remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Shoto Lightsaber

name: Weapons Cache
text: [special] - Play a weapon from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: Weapons Cache

name: BD-1 Cutter Vibro-AX
text: Before this die deals damage to a character, you may remove all shields from that character.
label: BD-1 Cutter Vibro-AX

name: Extortion
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Choose an opponent. If you have more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) than that opponent, take 1 resource from them.
label: Extortion

name: X-8 Night Sniper
text: Ambush. Action - Spend 1 resource to turn this die to any side.
flavor: The X-8 Night Sniper's computerized scope and built-in silencer made it a weapon of choice for Lando Calrissian.
label: X-8 Night Sniper

name: Z-95 Headhunter
flavor: Developed by Incom Corporation and Subpro, the Z-95 Headhunter was a versatile snub-fighter that continued to see use long after it was surpassed by the T-65 X-Wing.
label: Z-95 Headhunter

name: Chance Cube
text: Before you activate attached character, return this upgrade to your hand unless you spend 1 resource.
flavor: "We'll let fate decide." <cite>Watto</cite>
label: Chance Cube

name: EMP Grenades
text: [special] - Discard a droid or vehicle from play. Discard this upgrade from play.
flavor: Electromagnetic pulse grenades were extremely effective against weapon platforms with electronic systems.
label: EMP Grenades

name: Lead by Example
text: After you activate attached character, you may activate one of your supports.
label: Lead by Example

name: Scatterblaster
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage each to up to 4 different characters. Action - Remove one of attached character's character dice to turn this die to any side.
label: Scatterblaster

name: Commandeer
text: Resolve an opponent's vehicle die as if it were your own. If that die has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.
label: Commandeer

name: Crossfire
text: Remove a die showing a resource cost or spend 1 resource to remove 2 dice showing a resource cost.
flavor: "Watch that crossfire, boys." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Crossfire

name: Drop Your Weapon!
text: Spot 2 Red characters to discard a weapon from a ready character.
label: Drop Your Weapon!

name: Imperial Backing
text:
Ambush.
Play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 for each character you have.
label: Imperial Backing

name: Prepare for War
text: Play only if this is the first action of this round (no player has taken an action). Gain 1 resource.
label: Prepare for War

name: Red Alert
text: Ready a non-unique Red character.
label: Red Alert

name: Ruthless Tactics
text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the resource cost showing on it.
label: Ruthless Tactics

name: Take Prisoner
text: Choose an opponent. Discard 2 random cards from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.
label: Take Prisoner

name: Imperial HQ
text: Before you resolve a die showing a resource cost, you may exhaust this support to decrease that resource cost by 1.
label: Imperial HQ

name: As You Command
text: Resolve one of your character dice as if it were showing a focus ([focus]) (it keeps its value).
label: As You Command

name: Cornered Prey
text: Count the number of dice an opponent has showing a blank ([blank]). Deal that much damage to a character.
label: Cornered Prey

name: Indomitable
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character.
Give a Blue character 3 shields.
flavor: "Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Indomitable

name: It Will All Be Mine
text: Turn each of an opponent's dice showing a blank ([blank]) to any side. Then resolve any number of those dice in the order of your choice, as if they were your own.
label: It Will All Be Mine

name: Kill Them All
text: Deal 1 damage to each non-unique character your opponents have.
flavor: The First Order executed every member of the village on Jakku rather than leave any witnesses.
label: Kill Them All

name: Unyielding
text: Resolve any number of your Blue dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) in the order of your choice, treating this damage as unblockable.
label: Unyielding

name: Insidious
text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource if an opponent's character die is showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Insidious

name: Hate
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, you may deal it 1 damage to deal 1 damage to another character.
label: Hate

name: Anarchy
text: Remove one of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to each of an opponent's characters equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Anarchy

name: Bounty Postings
text: Draw cards equal to the number of characters an opponent has.
label: Bounty Postings

name: Buy Out
text: Spend any number of resources. Then discards cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of resources you just spent.
label: Buy Out

name: Coercion
text: Spot a Yellow character to reveal an opponent's hand and choose an event in it. They must play that event as their next action, if able.
label: Coercion

name: Only Business Matters
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then gain 1 resource for each die you just removed.
label: Only Business Matters

name: Pilfered Goods
text: You may play an upgrade from your hand for free on each of your Yellow characters.
flavor: The best gear is hard to come by legality.
label: Pilfered Goods

name: Twin Shadows
text: Spot 2 characters with the same title to remove up to 2 dice.
label: Twin Shadows

name: Hutt Ties
text: Action - Exhaust this support to force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or choose and remove one of their dice.
flavor: The Hutts were powerful gangsters with an interplanetary criminal empire.
label: Hutt Ties

name: Deadly
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade and remove one of attached character's dice to deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Deadly

name: No Survivors
text: Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's damaged characters.
label: No Survivors

name: Detention Center
text: Action - Exhaust this support to remove a character die. Then any player may remove one of their character dice to discard this support from play.
label: Detention Center

name: All Quiet On The Front
text: Remove any number of shields from your characters. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of shields you just removed.
label: All Quiet On The Front

name: Entrenched
text: Give 5 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
label: Entrenched

name: Fortuitous Strike
text: Spot a Red character to reroll any number of your dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just rerolled that are now showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Fortuitous Strike

name: Rearguard
text: Count the number of Red dice you have showing a shield ([shield]). Remove up to that many dice.
flavor: "It's risky, but we can't hold out much longer." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: Rearguard

name: Reckless Reentry
text: Choose a die on one of your vehicles in play and roll it into your pool. Then discard that vehicle if its die just rolled a blank ([blank]).
label: Reckless Reentry

name: Strike Briefing
text: Look at the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck and rearrange them in any order. Then you may discard the top card of that deck.
label: Strike Briefing

name: Swift Strike
text: Remove a die showing a modifier side (a side with a +).
label: Swift Strike

name: Rally Aid
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reveal a random card in your hand. You may play that card, decreasing its cost by 1, or by 2 instead if it's a vehicle.
label: Rally Aid

name: Shield Generator
text: Before one of your supports would be discard from play by an opponent's card effect or die, you may instead discard this support from play.
label: Shield Generator

name: At Peace
text: Turn each die that has one or more blanks to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: At Peace

name: Bestow
text: Move a non-ability upgrade from one of your Blue characters to another character (return that upgrade's die to its card).
flavor: "This is your father's lightsaber." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Bestow

name: Bring Balance
text: Choose an opponent that has more cards in hand than you. Draw cards up to the number of cards in their hand.
label: Bring Balance

name: Reaping The Crystal
text: Play a Blue card that costs 3 or more from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Reaping The Crystal

name: Secret Mission
text: Choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow, or Gray). Then discard the top card of an opponent's deck. If that card is the chosen color, gain 1 resource.
label: Secret Mission

name: Trust The Force
text: Reroll any number of Blue dice.
label: Trust The Force

name: Funeral Pyre
text: Before one of your Blue characters is defeated, you may move an upgrade from it to another one of your characterss (return that upgrade's die to its card).
label: Funeral Pyre

name: Yoda's Quarters
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your character dice to heal 2 damage from that character.
label: Yoda's Quarters

name: Fearless
text: After you activate attached character, you may give it 1 shield and draw a card.
label: Fearless

name: Against The Odds
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then, if it just rerolled the same symbol, you may resolve it, increasing its value by 2.
label: Against The Odds

name: Appraise
text: Remove one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: Appraise

name: Bad Feeling
text: Remove one of your dice to reroll any number of dice.
label: Bad Feeling

name: Double-Cross
text: Remove one of your Yellow character dice to resolve an opponent's die as if it were your own.
label: Double-Cross

name: Impersonate
text: Move damage among your characters as you wish (this ignores shields and you cannot exceed a character's health while moving this damage).
label: Impersonate

name: Local Patrol
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Local Patrol

name: Quick Escape
text: Remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). You must pass all of your future turns this round.
label: Quick Escape

name: Tenacity
text:
Play only if an opponent has more characters than you.
Exhaust one of that opponent's characters.
label: Tenacity

name: Running Interference
text: After you take an action, you may exhaust this support to choose an opponent. That opponent cannot take the same action that you just took on their next turn.
label: Running Interference

name: Thermal Paint
text: After you activate attached character, force an opponent to choose and deal 1 damage to one of their characters. Then you may discard this upgrade to deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Thermal Paint

name: Defiance
text: Reroll one of your character dice. Then heal damage from that character equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Defiance

name: Covering Fire
text: Count the number of dice you have showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Reroll up to that many of an opponent's dice.
label: Covering Fire

name: Deploy Squadron
text: Activate any number of your supports in the order of your choice.
label: Deploy Squadron

name: Fall Back
text: Each player may choose 1 upgrade, starting with you. Discard all upgrades from play that were not just chosen.
label: Fall Back

name: Feint
text: Activate one of your characters. Then you may remove all of its character and upgrade dice to ready it.
label: Feint

name: Flanking Maneuver
text: Count the number of support dice in your pool. Deal that much damage to a character.
label: Flanking Maneuver

name: Heat Of Battle
text: Choose an opponent. That opponent turns up to 2 of their dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Heat Of Battle

name: Pinned Down
text: Spot a vehicle to remove a die.
label: Pinned Down

name: The Day is Ours
text: Claim the battlefield, even if an opponent has claimed it this round.
label: The Day is Ours

name: Drop Zone
text: After you claim the battlefield, you may place 1 damage on this support. Action - Exhaust this support to move any amoount of damage from it to a character (this ignores shields).
label: Drop Zone

name: Tech Team
text: Before you play a support, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: Tech Team

name: Battle of Wills
text: Each player activates one of their characters, starting with you. Then each player totals the value of the character dice they just rolled, and each player with the lowest combined value removes theirs.
label: Battle of Wills

name: Force Vision
text: Ambush. Look at the top 5 cards of a player's deck (do not rearrange them).
label: Force Vision

name: Lightsaber Pull
text: Spot a Blue character to search your deck for a Blue weapon, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Lightsaber Pull

name: Lightsaber Training
text: Turn up to 2 of your Blue weapon dice to sides of your choice.
label: Lightsaber Training

name: No Surrender
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice showing a blank ([blank]). Then you may resolve it.
label: No Surrender

name: Something familiar
text: Spot 2 Blue character to reveal a random card from an opponent's hand. Then you may turn a number of dice equal to or less than that card's cost to sides of your choice.
label: Something familiar

name: Voices Cry Out
text: Reroll all dice showing a value of 2 or higher.
flavor: "I felt a great disturbance in the Force…" <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Voices Cry Out

name: Keen Instincts
text: Blue character only. Action - Remove one of attached character's character dice to give it 1 shield.
label: Keen Instincts

name: Battle Rage
text: Spot a character that has 6 or more damage on it. Resolve one of that character's character dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]), increasing its value by 2.
label: Battle Rage

name: Disable
text: Exhaust a support.
label: Disable

name: Persuade
text: Choose an opponent who has less resources than you. Then turn one of their dice to any side.
label: Persuade

name: Pickpocket
text: Discard a random card from each opponent's hand. Draw cards equal to the number of cards that were just discarded.
label: Pickpocket

name: Threaten
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's character die unless they deal damage to that character equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Threaten

name: Trickery
text: Discard your hand. For each card just discarded, you may remove a die showing a value that is equal to that card's cost.
label: Trickery

name: Truce
text:
Ambush.
Each player gains 1 resource.
label: Truce

name: Stolen Cache
text: After you play this support, exhaust it. Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource. Discard this support from play.
label: Stolen Cache

name: Hidden Agenda
text: Action - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2. Discard this upgrade from play.
label: Hidden Agenda

name: Mandalorian Armor
text:
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield.
Attached character can have 1 additional shield.
flavor: Mandalorian armor was renowned for its durability.
label: Mandalorian Armor

name: Dangerous Mission
text: Turn a die to a side showing a resource cost.
label: Dangerous Mission

name: Endurance
text:
Play only if one or more of your dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round.
Roll one of those removed dice into your pool.
label: Endurance

name: Partnership
text: Activate one of your characters and one of your supports. Then you may spend 1 resource to take an additional action.
label: Partnership

name: Recycle
text: Discard one of your supports from play. Then gain resources equal to its cost.
label: Recycle

name: Rend
text: Discard a support or upgrade that costs 0 from play.
flavor: When facing an overpowered adversary, precision often prevails over brute strength.
label: Rend

name: Roll On
text: Reroll one of your dice. You may reroll that die. You may reroll that die again.
flavor: "Come on, BB-8! Hurry!" <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
label: Roll On

name: Plastoid Armor
text: Attached character gains +1 health.
label: Plastoid Armor

name: B'Omarr Monastery
subtitle: Teth
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice showing a modifier side (a side with a +) as if it were not modified.
label: B'Omarr Monastery - Teth

name: Fort Anaxes
subtitle: Anaxes
text: While you control this battlefield, each of your characters have the Guardian keyword.
label: Fort Anaxes - Anaxes

name: Garel Spaceport
subtitle: Garel
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to gain resources equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.
label: Garel Spaceport - Garel

name: Imperial Academy
subtitle: Lothal
text: While you control this battlefield, after you activate a support, you may reroll its die.
label: Imperial Academy - Lothal

name: Main Plaza
subtitle: Vashka
text: Claim - Move 1 damage from a character to this battlefield or move all damage from this battlefield to a character (this ignores shields).
label: Main Plaza - Vashka

name: Medical Center
subtitle: Kaliida Shoals
text: Claim - Heal 1 damage each from up to 2 different characters. Give control of this battlefield to an opponent.
label: Medical Center - Kaliida Shoals

name: Port District
subtitle: Bespin
text: While you control this battlefield, each card you play that costs 3 or more has the Ambush keyword.
label: Port District - Bespin

name: Weapons Factory Alpha
subtitle: Cymoon 1
text: While you control this battlefield, the cost of the first vehicle you play each round is decreased by 1.
label: Weapons Factory Alpha - Cymoon 1

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Tormented One
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow or Gray). Then reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Kylo Ren - Tormented One

name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Ruthless Tactician
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 6 or more damage on it.
flavor: "You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy."
label: Captain Phasma - Ruthless Tactician

name: Droid Commandos
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage each to any number of characters.
flavor: Though superior to standard battle droids, this model of droid was too expensive to deploy in large numbers.
label: Droid Commandos

name: Captain Phasma's Blaster
text: While this upgrade is attached to Captain Phasma, it has the Redeploy keyword.
flavor: "My troops will storm this block and kill you all." <cite>Captain Phasma</cite>
label: Captain Phasma's Blaster

name: Praetorian Guard
text: Attached character has the Guardian keyword.
label: Praetorian Guard

name: Dark Counsel
text: [special] - Draw a card. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Dark Counsel

name: Crossguard Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Kylo Ren, deal 1 damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 1 or more shields.
label: Crossguard Lightsaber

name: Force Stasis
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Remove a die showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Then deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Force Stasis

name: Jedi Rival
text: After you activate attached character, you may remove 1 shield from a character.
flavor: "I will find them quickly, Master." <cite>Darth Maul</cite>
label: Jedi Rival

name: Armored Support
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your Red dice. If that die rolls damage ([ranged] or [melee]), deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Armored Support

name: First Strike
text: Deal damage to a character equal to the value on an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: First Strike

name: I Have You Now
text: Turn a die to a side showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: I Have You Now

name: Imperial Envoy
text: Reveal 2 random cards in an opponent's hand. Then deal 1 damage to a character for each event and support just revealed.
label: Imperial Envoy

name: Mobilize
text: Gain 4 resources.
flavor: "Dispatch all squadrons…" <cite>General Hux</cite>
label: Mobilize

name: Tactical Mastery
text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.
label: Tactical Mastery

name: As I Have Foreseen
text:
Ambush.
Look at each opponent's hand.
label: As I Have Foreseen

name: Clash
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing melee damage ([melee]). Turn an opponent's die showing melee damage ([melee]) to a blank ([blank]).
label: Clash

name: Intimidate
text: Remove all shields from a character.
label: Intimidate

name: Your Skills Are Complete
text: Turn an upgrade die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
flavor: "I see you have constructed a new lightsaber." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Your Skills Are Complete

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.
label: Doubt

name: Parry
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Parry

name: Subjugate
text: Remove a die.
flavor: "I won't have you question my methods." <cite>General Hux</cite>
label: Subjugate

name: Hangar Bay
subtitle: Imperial Fleet
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If that card is an event or support, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Hangar Bay - Imperial Fleet

name: Rey
subtitle: Finding The Ways
text: After you activate this character, if she has 1 or more shields, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "The Force, it's calling you." <cite>Maz Kanata</cite>
label: Rey - Finding The Ways

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: More Than A Pilot
text: [special] - Give a character 1 shield. You may turn another die to any side.
flavor: "The Resistance will not be intimidated by you."
label: Poe Dameron - More Than A Pilot

name: Medical Droid
text: [special] - Heal 1 damage from a character.
flavor: Unlike biological doctors, medical droids could heal most species due to their extensive databanks.
label: Medical Droid

name: Strike Team
text:
Ambush.
Decrease the cost to play this support by 1 if an opponent has 3 or more resources.
label: Strike Team

name: Teamwork
text: [special] - Give attached character 1 shield. You may give another character 1 shield.
flavor: "Why I should stick my neck out for you is far beyond my opacity!" <cite>C-3P0</cite>
label: Teamwork

name: Poe Dameron's Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is Poe Dameron.
label: Poe Dameron's Blaster

name: Rey's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if attached character is Rey.
label: Rey's Lightsaber

name: Inner Strength
text: [special] - Move 1 damage from attached character to an opponent's character with no shields.
label: Inner Strength

name: Luke's Protection
text: Action - Place this support on top of your deck from play to give a Blue character 1 shield.
flavor: "If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise." <cite>Snoke</cite>
label: Luke's Protection

name: Honor Guard
text: Action - Discard this support from play to remove a die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Honor Guard

name: Direct Hit
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]), increasing its value by 2.
label: Direct Hit

name: Logistics
text: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol ([resource]), increasing its value by 1.
label: Logistics

name: Recon
text: Choose a symbol showing on a die. Then turn another die to a side showing the same symbol.
label: Recon

name: Strategic Planning
text: Ready or exhaust a support.
label: Strategic Planning

name: Concentrate
text: Turn one of your dice to any side. You may spend 1 resource to turn another one of your dice to any side.
flavor: "Through the Force, things you will see." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Concentrate

name: Defensive Stance
text: Give a character 2 shields.
label: Defensive Stance

name: Distraction
text: Choose 2 dice. Then an opponent chooses and removes one of those dice.
flavor: "Maybe it's another drill." <cite>Stormtrooper</cite>
label: Distraction

name: Do Or Do Not
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve it, increasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.
flavor: "There is no try." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Do Or Do Not

name: Fierce Resolve
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on that die.
flavor: "I'll never turn to the dark side." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Fierce Resolve

name: Evade
text: Remove a die showing ranged damage [ranged]
label: Evade

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Flank

name: Sound The Alarm
text: Reroll any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Sound The Alarm

name: Obi-Wan's Hut
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Give a Blue character 1 shield or spend 1 resource to give a non-Blue character 1 shield.
label: Obi-Wan's Hut - Tatooine

name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Nightsister Matriarch
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of a player's deck. If its cost is an odd number, turn one of that player's dice to any side.
flavor: "I use dark magick to achieve power."
label: Mother Talzin - Nightsister Matriarch

name: Crystal Ball
text: After you activate attached character, you may look at the top card of a deck.
label: Crystal Ball

name: Battle Droid
text: After you activate this character, if this die just rolled indirect damage ([indirect]), you may activate one of your other Battle Droids ([LEG]9).
flavor: "Roger, Roger."
label: Battle Droid

name: Veteran Stormtrooper
flavor: The elite soldier of the Imperial Military, trained for complete obedience to the command hierarchy, as well as the Galactic Emperor Palpatine.
label: Veteran Stormtrooper

name: Separatist Landing Craft
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to add a Battle Droid ([LEG]9) to your team. Discard this support from play.
flavor: A heavy transport starship used by the Trade Federation for transporting and deploying droid battalions planet side.
label: Separatist Landing Craft

name: Boba Fett
subtitle: Deadly Mercenary
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on a die (yours or an opponent's).
flavor: "Don't get in my way."
label: Boba Fett - Deadly Mercenary

name: Doctor Aphra
subtitle: Artifact Hunter
text: The cost of the first droid you play each round is decreased by 1. After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may draw a card.
label: Doctor Aphra - Artifact Hunter

name: BT-1
text: After you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: BT-1

name: Slave I
text: Power Action - Reroll one of your Yellow dice. Then you may remove an opponent's die showing a value equal to the value showing on the die you just rerolled.
label: Slave I

name: Wrist Rockets
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Deal one damage to a character. You may spend 1 resource to deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Wrist Rockets

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Unlikely Hero
text: Power Action - Spend 2 resources to resolve one of this character's character or upgrade dice, increasing its value by 2.
flavor: "I want to learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi like my father."
label: Luke Skywalker - Unlikely Hero

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Jedi Master
text: After you activate this character, you may give a character 1 shield.
flavor: "Your move"
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Jedi Master

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give attached character 1 shield. Deal unblockable damage to a character equal to the number of shields on attached character.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber

name: Wedge Antilles
subtitle: Squad Leader
text: Power Action - Turn one of your vehicle dice to any side.
flavor: "Making my run now."
label: Wedge Antilles - Squad Leader

name: Resistance Bomber
text:
After this die is resolved, place 1 damage on this support.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Resistance Bomber

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Savvy Smuggler
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
flavor: "Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid."
label: Han Solo - Savvy Smuggler

name: Millennium Falcon
text: After to activate this support, you may activate one of your characters.
flavor: "Chewie… we're home." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: Force Focus
text:
To play, spot a Blue character.
[special] - Turn one of your dice to any side. You may reveal a Blue card from your hand to turn an opponent's die to any side.
label: Force Focus

name: Heirloom Lightsaber
text: This upgrade has the Reploy keyword while it's on a Blue character.
label: Heirloom Lightsaber

name: Nightsister Coven
text: After a character die rolls a blank ([blank]), you may exhaust this support to reveal the top card of a deck. If its cost is an odd number, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Nightsister Coven

name: Delve
text: Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to play a support or upgrade from your hand for free.
flavor: "That was fun. Let's never do that again." <cite>Doctor Aphra</cite>
label: Delve

name: Impulsive
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your dice.
label: Impulsive

name: Maz's Vault
text: Each player gains 1 additional resource during the upkeep phase.
flavor: Maz Kanata amassed a large collection of curiosities from her many travels throughout the galaxy.
label: Maz's Vault

name: Crash Landing
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Crash Landing

name: Locked and Loaded
text: Spot a Red character to turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing indirect damage ([indirect]).
label: Locked and Loaded

name: Reinforce
text: Roll a character die on one of your character into your pool if you have another copy of that character in play.
label: Reinforce

name: Strength in Numbers
text: Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of exhausted characters you have.
label: Strength in Numbers

name: Bubble Shield
text:
You may distribute indirect damage ([indirect]) to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Bubble Shield

name: Espionage
text: After setup, discard the top card from each deck.
label: Espionage

name: Profitable Connection
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.
label: Profitable Connection

name: Arid Wasteland
subtitle: Geonosis
text: Claim - Force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Arid Wasteland - Geonosis

name: Outer Rim Outpost
subtitle: Nal Hutta
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource and draw a card.
label: Outer Rim Outpost - Nal Hutta

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Conflicted Apprentice
text:
You cannot have Darth Vader on your team.
[special] - Discard a hero card from your hand to give a character 2 shields or discard a villian card from your hand to deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Anakin Skywalker - Conflicted Apprentice

name: Lobot
subtitle: Cyborg Aide
text:
While you control the battlefield, this character has the Guardian keyword.
[special] - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 2.
flavor: "I live by my choices."
label: Lobot - Cyborg Aide

name: Ketsu Onyo
subtitle: Black Sun Operative
text: Before one of your characters is defeated, you may move a weapon from them to this character.
flavor: "Friend. That's a generous term considering what happened."
label: Ketsu Onyo - Black Sun Operative

name: Jawa Scavenger
text: After you activate this character, you may discard one of your supports or upgrades that costs 2 or more from play to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "I can't abide those Jawas. Disgusting creatures!" <cite>C-3PO</cite>
label: Jawa Scavenger

name: Resourceful
text: Spot a Gray character and remove one of your dice to gain 1 resource.
label: Resourceful
